name: pixel-plugin
description: Create, animate, and export pixel art using Aseprite through natural language.
author: Mineru98

hooks.postInstall: chmod +x ./bin/pixel-mcp-* && mkdir -p ~/.config/pixel-mcp && [ ! -f ~/.config/pixel-mcp/config.json ] && echo '{"aseprite_path": "/Applications/Aseprite.app/Contents/MacOS/aseprite"}' > ~/.config/pixel-mcp/config.json || echo 'Config already exists.'
